name: Deserted Islanders
description:
Explore a small deserted island, collect food to survive, and try to collect supplies to make a raft!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Change direction, Move through menus
  • Z key: Move across tiles, Select menu items, Stop the spinning wheel
  • X key: Open/Close Inventory, Place your tent
  • P key: Increase screen size or turn on/off full-screen
  • F key: Reset the level

Every time you play, the character's species, names, and colors are randomized! Some animals have different specialties, and can help better in a pinch. Here's the animals you have a chance of getting upon starting the game (resetting via F doesn't count):

  1. Dog
  2. Cat
  3. Fox
  4. Frog
  5. Wolf
  6. Squirrel
  7. Deer

Developer's Note:

I created this game as a self-challenge in a week, within Game Maker Studio 2. I started it May 24, and wrapped it up on the 1st of June. The total project use time was set as: 1 day, 16 Hours, and 31 minutes. If you'd like to give me feedback, shoot me a tweet at @FloofsDev! I'd like to hear what you thought about this.
